title: Really great experience
comment: Really glad to be here for the restaurant re opening! The new menu was amazing and really creative! All the staff was helpful and smiling! Perfect birthday meal with my mum!

title: Great choice!
comment: We arrived at the restaurant 45 minutes late due to London’s traffic but the staff was still able to accommodate us. Dishes are extremely well presented and the food is of high quality. Service was fast and accurate thanks to Ornella who was very professional. Final mention to the amazing view which is breathtaking. Absolutely recommended.

title: The staff make this place special
comment: Lovely ambiance,nicest, most thoughtful staff that tried their best all evening, accompanied by beautiful food. Would recommend

title: Nice bar, super view
comment: Me and my friends was there last year. It was so nice and joyful. Staff was helpful. I heard that it's open now again. so we will definitely go there again :)

title: What an amazing experience!
comment: Tonight we went to Bokan with a group of friends and I can tell you: we had a fantastic experience! Nothing like receiving great service, eating exquisite food and feeling super special as a customer. Florian was amazing and recommended what to eat, and he was absolutely right! Oh my goodness! Eating fantastic french food and having 5* service from Florian and Nelson! Thank you, thank you!

title: Always a TREAT
comment: What can I say I just love this restaurant! Having been there several times now I am never disappointed. The chef and his team never let down my palate! They never disappoint! Thanks again Bokan team and see you VERY soon! A very pleased and faithful Client!

title: Amazing staff - especially Tatyana
comment: Bokan has been our favorite Saturday spot with my Flatmate to get a drink before the curfew cut. Tatyana at the door downstairs always makes sure to assist us upon entry, guide us and sometimes even find us a place if we are doing a spontaneous visit (my advice is to always book in advance). Utmost kindness and always makes us feel like special guests!

title: Excellent experience !
comment: We had an amazing evening at Bokan. The restaurant setting and the views are stunning. The service was top notch. We were served by Florian and Nelson who made our evening even more special. Even the chef came out to meet us. The food was truly an experience to remember. Can’t wait to go back!

title: Dinner, Drinks and one heck of a view!
comment: My girlfriend and I enjoyed a fantastic meal at Bokan, just before Bonfire night. We had an excellent dinner, with 5* service and highly knowledgeable staff who genuinely cared about crafting us a perfect evening. To miss out on the drinks and the view would be a travesty, as each drink was made to perfection and the views across London were incredible. Finally, thanks go to Florian Fortoul, who ensured we were expertly taken care of all night.  We cannot wait to return!

title: Outstanding service and wonderful
comment: Outstanding service and wonderful food . Loved my first visit with fantastic views. Opted for the Prosecco brunch - the glass was filled constantly without asking. The waitress was fantastic- really amazing service

title: Come here for the evening
comment: Come here for the evening on a date very happy with the service had a lovely lady serving us her name was Athina very attentive! Would definitely recommend and come again! Thank you Bokan

title: Disappointed
comment: I dined here with friends on a Saturday night, restaurant was not crazy busy and we had a wonderful table by the window with an amazing view. This was the only positive point I can say about my dinner experience. It was not the first time for me here, I visited the bar and the restaurant few times and this was very disappointing: we went with the tasting menu and between the first 3 courses we waited a crazy amount of time (30/40 minutes) and we then asked if it was possible to speed up a little bit. After our request was taken very seriously and we did not even have the time to finish the following course that we have our plate cleared and the new course on the table. The service was bland, not attentive at all. Clearing the table a waitress dropped a fork on my friend’s dress and did not even apologise! She looked at my friend like it was her fault.  What is more I mentioned in the booking notes, I called and I sent an email as it was a special birthday celebration and I was reassured that they would have presented a celebration cake at the table. We had dessert, we had coffe, asked for the bill.... celebration plate never arrived. This is not what you expect when you pay almost £500 for a dinner not even in a Michelin star or anything like that. I won’t be back in the restaurant for sure.

title: Amazing food
comment: Highly recommend the food! The most amazing location and the best chefs!great view, amazing food, exciting flavours that I've never tried before! I went with my friends and with my family! Great place for romantic dinner ❤

title: Amazing cuisine
comment: The best food cooked by amazing chefs# served by very friendly staff! Amazing view as well! Highly recommend the restaurant #

title: THE WORST CUSTOMER LOYALTY IN LONDON! MCDONALDS STYLE MANAGEMENT & ATTITUDE WITH BETTER FOOD.
comment: For about 2 years I've dinned at Bokan approximately 4 times a month and maybe even more. I even chose Bokan for Christmas lunch. I think I could be considered a good, if not a very loyal client. I have never pulled rank, never asked for special treatment and never got stressed out over the placement of the table. I have now planned a dinner for 6 at Bokan next month. For this one time I asked if I could reserve a table of my choice for this very special group of people to experience the restaurant. I was told very plainly and clearly ..... NO, IT IS NOT OUR POLICY! I was even told by one staff member that if I came 2 hours in advance of the dinner at 6pm I could then take the table of my choice because the place would be empty !!!! Now, I have been dining in the best restaurants in the world for about 60 years in fact long before any of the Bokan staff could even spell the word restaurant. The fact that for one time I'm not able to book a table of my choice proves several facts. 1. There is no restaurant / customer loyalty. 2. The management of the restaurant really has no idea what world class dining is about! 3. The customers of Bokan are merely a number and the place clearly caters to the transient diner with whom they need not establish a rapport or a relationship with. Considering this attitude of Bokan I will take my custom as well as my friends elsewhere. We will dine on the special evening mentioned at C. London (Cipriani) where I can book the table I feel comfortable at, where the table linens are as exquisite as the food and the white uniformed staff is smiling, courteous, and care about me ...... the customer. Goodbye Bokan. Your mediocre service will not take you far. By the way, The Ivy In The Park is also a wonderful restaurant that cares about their clients.

title: Incredible Brunch
comment: I can not fault Boken 37. Their food is exemplary, their service generous and impeccable. This was the most incredible brunch experience I’ve had in London and I cannot recommend it enough.

title: Excellent bar staff!
comment: I came here for a drink after dinner only, as I’ve been to another restaurant for dinner that evening. The evening I was here they had live music that was very nice and not too loud and therefore created a good atmosphere.  Besides that I have to give a big shout out to the bar staff! They were awesome. Somehow I could not decide between the drinks on their menu, because none of them was appealing to me that evening. Please don’t get me wrong, they have a very nice drinks menu and I am sure anyone will find something to their liking on there. After a conversation with the staff they simply offered me to create a drink that suited my taste from scratch and it was fabulous! Unfortunately I can’t recommend the drink to you here on Tripadvisor, as it is not on the menu, but in my opinion this was just amazing. I would always come back here!

title: Great food, service and amazing views
comment: Took my friend for her birthday it was one of the best restaurants experiences I have had in London. The staff was so so helpful and could not do enough to help you and spoke us over everything we ate and drank.  We went for the 6 course tasting menu which was amazing choice and served so nicely and on request not when they wanted us to have it. It is a great relaxing restaurant.

title: Bottomless brunch with a view
comment: What a great place we chose for our bottomless brunch, never once had an empty glass for two hours! Never rushed us off the table. Stayed all afternoon. The food was AMAZING. Staff were great and can’t wait to return. Oh and the views are incredible even in Storm Dennis!!

title: Romantic dinner.
comment: Having been recommended this restaurant by my daughter, I can honestly say it went above and beyond my expectations. The staff were so attentive, food was out of this world (had to shake the chef's hand and say thank you) view is amazing. If you are looking for that somewhere special then this is the place. We will be back for sure.

title: Lovely food let down by front of house
comment: Bokan 37 is an expensive restaurant. So I expected the service to be top class too. However, it was very disjointed. On arrival, as a party of 4, we were not offered a drink but given the wine menu. So we selected a bottle of champagne. The waitress took our order for the champagne and the starters and main courses. She sent over the sommelier who recommended and left on the table a claret for the main course. We then waited for a while until the starters arrived whereby we had to chase up the champagne. When it finally arrived the waiter tried to take away the claret glasses until we retrieved them as we also had our claret, long before the champagne. Fortunately we had chosen cold starters. Then during the main course one of the waitresses leant right across the table to pour the jus rather than going around. The service continued rather haphazardly all evening. Overall, the view is lovely, the food is tasty and beautifully presented but the kitchen is let down by a disorganised (but friendly) waiting staff.

title: Perfection as usual
comment: This was my third time at Bokan and as expected it was magnificent! To the person who welcomes you yo the last spoon of desert everything is exceptional! Every time I go I discover new mix of flavours that I would never imagine could go so well together! It’s always a delight to the palate and the eyes! Again my compliment to Chef Guillaume and this time a very big thank you to the new Manager of the restaurant Florian who gave us a proper welcome! Can’t wait to go again definitely one of my favourite place in London!

title: Bokan 38 Bar; Well looked after, great views...
comment: Great setting on 38th floor with extensive views over London skyline... Spacious table for party of six, (advise booking in advance at popular times), well looked after by the bar staff, stayed for about 2 hrs and had a great time. Recommended

title: A wonder
comment: My brother and I went to Bokan for dinner last week and I'll surely return. First, the view, breath-taking! Maybe one of the best in London.  Then the service, brilliant. Professional, precise, very knowledgeable and lovely staff. And the food! Outstanding! The young Head chef, French and talented, is so creative. The association of flavors and textures, gorgeous.  It's been a long time I've had such a surprising and delightful dinner.  Modernity weds UK sourced products with perfection. The menu is intelligent, using local and seasonal products, artistic, plates are wonderful, and nearly magical, making octopus dance gracefully with clementine and chocolate is definitely magic. Go there with no hesitation, you won't be desappointed! Congratulations to this young and efficient team lead by the charming Florian.

title: MAGNIFIQUE
comment: Whaou  It’s really really good,  We’re passionned about good gastromy in France, and this restaurant it´s absolutely perfect! The view is fantastic  The food is fabulous  The service is so nice  Always it’s really perfect  Again thanks you for this moment fantastic  «the better restaurant in London »

title: Christmas Disasters
comment: I booked Bokan Christmas dinner because we were staying in the hotel on 25/12/19 and at the time of booking, I spoke to a staff who told me that on Christmas Day the restaurant would serve turkey and Christmas pudding with custard. On Christmas Day I was shocked and upset at the restaurant when I spoke to a waiter and I was told that there was no turkey or Christmas pudding with custard. The waitress gave us a table in the corner facing the window and no one could see our faces only our backs. We received bad customer care, a waiter took our orders he frequently went to other tables and check if other customers were ok and if their food is ok and we were ignored. I had to get out of my seat to go over to speak to a waiter to say that I was not happy with the starter.  I received the crab starter but it was making me sick so I was given the salmon but it was raw and I was unable to eat this.  We ordered the main dish cow’s cheek and chips but when this arrived we ate a small piece but it was slimy and was making us sick. We called the waiter and asked him if we could have another main dish and he said, “No because the chef cooked it for us and cannot give us another main dish.” My daughter and I only ate the chips for the main dish.  The waitress recommended The Red Seal cocktail, this was served in a long stem champagne glass and not a cocktail glass and it was very sour. We told the waiter that we did not like it because it was very sour. He said he would ask the bar upstairs to make us a sweet cocktail. We were given another cocktail in a black African head glass. I asked the waiter if he could let me know what the ingredients are and if grapefruit juice was in the cocktail. He later returned and said grapefruit juice is not in the cocktail but he does not know the rest of the ingredients because they made it upstairs in the bar.  The dessert Christmas log with ice cream was ok.  The bill was presented in an old reading book “The Facemaker”. I asked the waiter I have never seen the bill presented in this way. He said it is new.  I rang the reception and spoke to Jerome about the problems we had in the restaurant and that our main meal Cow’s cheek was taken away but we were not offered another main meal and we were starving. My daughter is allergic to all nuts so when Jermore offered fish fingers and chips he later rang back to say that the fish fingers contain nuts. We told Jerome that we would have the Duck legs with chips. We received the Duck legs but it was cold and when we cut inside it was pink. We got the chips later. I was unable to sleep during the night because the duck was not digesting. On the morning of 26/12/19, we had severe vomiting and diarrhoea.  Due to the problems we suffered our Christmas 2019 was ruined.  I am never returning to this restaurant again.

title: Beautiful restaurant and staff apart of the event manager
comment: Came for business lunch. All the staff were amazing, but very poor communication between the events manager and waitress. The events manager told us that we are not able to change the pre-order, but at the end of the day, the waiter changed without any problems. Also, it took a lot of time to organize because the events manager was super slow and not really friendly.

title: Much better out there......
comment: We were on site so decided to visit. We shared a few starters and a main with a couple of cold beers. We arrived as the restaurant opened and were told there were only two lobsters left if that was what we fancied. Hopeless...The starters were good, we enjoyed those but when the mains finally arrived over an hour later all were dry and tasteless. For close to £ 300 pounds you would expect much, much better and I won’t bother again. Enjoy....

title: Wonderful experience !
comment: Never heard of this restaurant before but I heard it was good so I decided to give it a shot for a special evening with my girlfriend and I’m glad I did! The restaurant is very cosy with a great view of the city. The staff is very welcoming and the floor manager, Florian has been very helpful. I took the octopus as a starter and followed with the turbot. The dishes where delicious, with inventive and original combinations of ingredients. The chef, Guillaume, did an excellent job and I will surely be back!  I will definitely be back and I’d like to thank the whole team for making our night so special !

title: Beautiful as Well as good
comment: We went to dinner with my partner in this restaurant, and we came out absolutely smitten. The setting and the view are sublime, the atmosphere is warm, the team is very professional, and the dishes will amaze you with their flavours.  I highly recommend to spend a pleasant moment under all plans.

title: 25th Birthday Dinner
comment: We came from Italy just for two days for our son's birthday and we spent one evening at the Bokan 37. Everything was amazing except the table that wasn't the one we asked for when we booked, but it didn't really matter because the view was great anyway. Food and service were very good, we enjoyed the evening!

title: Delicious food, beautiful views and perfect service
comment: We went to Bokan for dinner on a Monday evening as a bit of a last minute celebration. We ordered the lamb and the duck. The mains were both delicious and full of flavour. We had assistance choosing the best red wines to go with our meals which was fantastic. We were served by Katherine who was wonderful and friendly and described what all the foods were. We will definitely return. The decor is fab and the views are great. Can’t fault it.

title: Amazing celebration of wedding anniversary
comment: I chose this restaurant to celebrate our 3 years wedding anniversary with my husband. I have never been there before, but I knew that it was a good choice once I saw the amazing view of London. The food was well cooked and delicious. We were served amuse bouche and warm bread with butter, which was a nice touch to start our meal. The portions were a bit small, but this is to be expected in this kind of restaurants. Now, our waiter, Konstantin was always friendly and made sure that we had a pleasant and unique experience. At the end, there was a surprise, a chocolate cake with the message "Happy Anniversary", which was the perfect way to finish this meal and experience. I totally reccomend this restaurant, especially for special occasions. Upstairs there is a bar with the same views, but we did not visit it this time.

title: Service awful, food OK, views fantastic
comment: We were kept waiting for an hour for a table although we had a reservation and stayed in the hotel. Coco, who appeared to be in charge of table organisation was unapologetic and patronising. There wasn’t enough staff to be attentive and alert. The food was good although the price had raised our expectations, which were not entirely met. I would give Bokan restaurant a miss, the bar and terrace are great.

title: Birthday Dinner
comment: Went with my boyfriend for his birthday dinner and it was absolutely amazing. Service was high level, food was great and the view was stunning. Personnel helped us with our dietary requirements and gave us the table we asked for when we booked. Definitely recommended!

title: Amazing dinner
comment: First,this place has a stunning view from the 37 floor,moreover there is a bar on the 38th floor and a terrace on the 39th f. We had a very warm welcome from coco the French host and our waiter (Portuguese guy with mustache) very knowledgeable of all the dishes and wines. We booked for the Chef menu tasting of 6 courses, very tasty food and dessert!Love it! We had a very romantic night.Thank you bokan!!!

title: Wonderful views, food and service
comment: The views at Bokan 37 were fantastic and we were lucky to have clear, sunny weather with lovely views over the London and the Thames. The set menu with unlimited prosecco was good value, with the warm waiting staff refusing to let your glass get anywhere near empty.  To round off a birthday celebration I was presented with a gorgeous mini cake with chocolates for the four of us, which was a lovely surprise organised by my friends. I would definitely revisit; well recommended.

title: Perfect brunch
comment: Thank you so much to the lovely staff at Bokan for hosting us for our brunch yesterday. You might have seen this restaurant featured on Celebrity Masterchef recently and it lived up to the exceptionally high standard of providing quality food and service. We had the bottomless prosecco brunch and not once did we need to ask to be topped up. We were given a table with a five star view of the city of London, really beautiful. For starters I had salmon with steamed hen eggs and it was absolutely delicious. My wife had a tuna starter which she loved. The next course was sirloin cooked to tender perfection on the Josper grill. Fabulous. The plum dessert didn't disappoint either. The service was excellent and we would highly recommend this restaurant for brunch on a sunny day.

title: Delicious food, free flowing Prosecco and super friendly service
comment: We had a wonderful brunch on Saturday. Amazing views across London and lovely atmosphere. Super friendly team who served us and made us feel very welcome.  The food was delicious, the Prosecco was free flowing and a high quality. Fun atmosphere in the bar afterwards too.  Will definitely be going back!

title: View to die for
comment: Called in without booking as residents of the Novotel expecting to be declined but to our surprise a delightful maitre d showed us to a table with a terrific view of the Thames. We ordered the butchers and cheese selection and the Chenin Blanc to accompany. All exceptional quality, if a little on the expensive side, but the view and the live music more than made up for this.

title: Brilliant food, 1 let down
comment: Food was Delicious, pigeon best I’ve had and ribeye cooked perfectly. We were sat 15 minutes after time allotted but was no issue as we had a drink in bar. The only downside that stopped me from giving 5 star was the wait at bar (although I understood it was busy and mainly time consuming cocktails) and the poor service in the restaurant, while it seemed most of the servers were attentive and lovely our waitress openly complained about her number of tables (just 4) and treated the evening with a distain for her job that reflected in her lack of attentiveness and poor attitude to that table (her general demeanour was of one who didn’t care of those she served, 35 minutes to order food, no drinks offered throughout the evening and when we did eventually order drinks we had to ask another waitress to search for them, which she was prompt in doing) apart from feeling like this one waitress didn’t really want to be there our evening was great. We left the restaurant and enjoyed more drinks in the bar

title: Romantic night out
comment: I was at bokan restaurant (Novotel, canary wharf), earlier this month to celebrate my wife's birthday. The food and drinks are nice and not expensive. The icing on the cake of our trip was pictures taken at bokan 39(an open bar on the 39th floor with an amazing view of London. I and my wife would have missed the opportunity of taking pictures and having the amazing view of London which bokan 39 offers, if not for the friendly and professional security manager(Emmanuel). He was the one that drew our attention to the existence of bokan 39 and what it offers. I and my wife hopes to visit bokan next month during our wedding anniversary.

title: Staff needs improvement
comment: Nice view but the service needs a lot of work  Initially the host did not ask if we would like to check our coats. I mentioned that every guest had their coats in the restaurant, which looked untidy with coats everywhere. .The table we sat was good , since we didn't have any reservation. We chose a bottle of an excellent wine, which we didn't enjoy enough because the waitress didn't have a clue how to open a wine bottle, and cork residues felt in. So we asked for another bottle straight away, as long as we knew how bad is for poisoning the cork.  The food we ordered was nothing special and overpriced. Our fried potatoes, of course, took 40 minutes to arrive. Great for its view and the easy access, but the service needs improvement (not worthy of the service charge you are required to pay).

title: Endroit incontournable
comment: Amazing restaurant with an incredible view on all the London city. It was a magical moment with the sunset. The food was really nice and delicat, but there are not many vegetarian choices... We will keep this moment at Bokan for a long time, for sure! Thanks to Corentin for his welcome and his amazing kindness!

title: Really Bad Customer Service!
comment: Absolutely terrible and unfriendly Service at the Bokan. Reserved weeks in advance for my birthday dinner and as it was in the middle of summer and 34 degrees our entire party was not let in because I was wearing sandals in the 34 degree summer heat! I have spent a lot of money at this place before and there was many other people wearing sandals in the 34 degree heat. They were very unfriendly about it and just told me I have to go; will never go there again!

title: Constantin was a lovely waiter!
comment: Had the pleasure of Constantin as our waiter. It was friend’s birthday so we celebrated in great company. Price of the food is a bit high but service and view is good

title: Great views, Great food and great staff
comment: The meal we had was amazing. Although in a rush to see the show the staff were speedy, professional but also relaxed. they made the effort to come and speak to me while my wife used the ladies room. The food is to die for. Similar prices to similar venues I have been to like the shard or Fenchurch in walkie talkie building but the food is ten times better. Could not choose off the menu as it all looked great, when we got our food we just wanted to at each others.

title: Amazing dinner, view & service
comment: Very friendly and complete service from start to finish. All the menu is great, very well-balanced flavours and presentation. Desserts were particularly good! Highly enjoyable and relaxed environment.

title: A piece of heaven in london!
comment: When i saw for the first time this pub/restaurant i have been shocked because there is an amazing view all around it. You can we london and it is really amazing the view. Speaking about the inside is very well and nice furnished, really nice style. If i want to make a nice impression with someone bokan is always the perfect choice. Lorenzo

title: Great menu choice, lovely presentation cooked nearly to perfection
comment: I chose king crab / pickles based starter (as did my wife), really enjoyed that. £14 each, not cheep. Mains, my wife had the organic lamb £32, me the Stone bass £29. Both cooked to perfection. However, I fed back to the waiting staff, the odd combination of white coco bean, as a fish-o-holic, always eager to try new combos, I simply didn;'t see the point, didn't work for me. No worries, fish was beautifully cooked so happy to leave the beans (apart from the 3 I tried). Our deserts were lovely too. It is expensive, great waiting staff and you can view the kitchen. As a treat, yep, I'd recommend it.

title: Couldn't get to the roof terrace...
comment: A week or so ago I booked a table at the restaurant on 37 and was hoping to have a drink on the roof terrace on 39 on this wonderful warm evening. Unfortunately for us the whole terrace had been booked for the evening so we had drinks on floor 38 instead. I had only found this out this morning when the receptionist called to confirm our reservation. This was mentioned on the website but I hadn’t thoroughly checked it. The guy on reception on 38 was very welcoming and perfect for front of house. The bar staff were very friendly and the guy that served our drinks at the table on 38 enjoyed conversation and a joke or two. As we were leaving to go to the restaurant I had half-jokingly asked him whether the tip we gave him included a quick sneak view of the party upstairs he became quite serious and said it was not possible. Maybe I read it wrongly but he seemed a little distant from that moment. At 7pm the restaurant had only 2-3 other tables booked and we were served quickly. Our waiter, Cristian, was a delight. Both the receptionist that called this morning and Cristian checked to see whether there were any allergies and also asked whether it was a special occasion. After choosing our mains and changing one meal there was a slight mix-up. This minor error with our meal choices would have been quickly corrected but we were happy to proceed as presented and the beef and duck choices were delicious as were the desserts. It was a slightly higher price than expected with a main, a side and a dessert each, with just one glass of wine at the table around £60 per head. To me the docklands area has a slightly distant ‘unreal’ feel to it and there was less interaction with other customers in this establishment than we usually find in The City and West End. This could well change depending on the night and could also be my own personal take on the vibe. I personally love the established feel about more historic areas in London.

title: Brilliant food with the best views of London
comment: The chefs tasting menu was absolutely fantastic. The staff where friendly and extremely approachable. If you’re looking for a roof top bar/restaurant with superb views choose Bokan!

title: Brunch With A View
comment: Based in the Canary Wharf Novotel this restaurant is the perfect place to have a relaxed brunch with delicious food and an awesome view. We had the brunch menu but did not opt for the additional bottomless Prosecco for £15. I would recommend this place for a birthday, romantic meal or just a general catch up with friends and family.

title: Bokan - Incredible dinner overlooking London
comment: Dinner at Bokan did exceed my expectations! On our arrival the staff greet us with such a warm welcome. We were lucky to be seated by the window, overlooking London and the city lights! Incredible menu options, but I decided trying the foie grass as starter, then the stone bass for main! Impeccable service, and super friendly staff! Definitely recommended!

title: Amazing views of London
comment: This is gem in the Docklands area of London. With great food, and amazing views of London. My only negative is the food portions are very small, however the quality and atmosphere makes up for this.

title: Beautiful View, Beautiful Food
comment: Took my partner here for his birthday as he loves a meal with a gorgeous view and Bokan did not disappoint. Im not sure why this restaurant is not more widely known as it is far superior in terms of the stunning view to many of the central restaurants in the city such as those based at the Shard. The food was delicious and the staff were very accommodating without being too much. It's not a cheap venue but if you're looking for somewhere for a special night out Bokan is 100% the place to go to.

title: Fantastic Food
comment: Visited whilst staying at Novotel Canary Wharf in November, for the Supervet show at the 02. Food excellent, service excellent, views amazing.

title: Average
comment: We went there for brunch .. all the foods were very presentable but no taste .. service was very good and friendly.. good atmosphere..

title: Very Good Dinnnng with a great View
comment: After a nice afternoon in Greenwich, we had a wonderful dinner in this very nice and beautiful restaurant. We were greeted very nicely and the staff is very helpful and dedicated. The food was wonderful and the view from the 37th floor was a dream. Any time again.

title: Great View, Food good, 5 star prices with 1 star service
comment: As loads of people mention, view is excellent. Food was good, chose the tasting menu, 70pp, and the wine pairing 40 pp. One round totally forgot to serve wine, despite waving arms could get no attention, ended up basically having to walk into kitchen to ask for wine to be shouted at “its coming” no apology, table behind kicked off for same reason shoddy service and they called Security, crazy. Took service off bill that was all.

title: Nice view!
comment: We had dinner in this restaurant. The view is amazing, we were lucky to have our table at the window. We arrived a little early and we asked for a apero in the rooftop bar! We had to go to our table and got our cocktail and also imediately our food. We didn’t had the time to enjoy our apero first, and we had enough time, the food was ok. It looked beautiful, but the Taste was a little less spicy. The waiter asked every time if we wanted more water/wine/dessert/coffee...  friendly but also like he wanted to sell more and more....  I didn’t like the dessert, the chocomouse was very bitter.

title: The best
comment: A stunning night with an amazing London view and the best service for dinner - high end wait staff, and top quality food. All beautifully presented and tasty. Thank you chef for your attention and passion.

title: Amazing food and very good service
comment: I came to have a dinner after a long week of work in London. Some friends recommanded Bokan to me. Excellent customer service. I had starter, main course and dessert with wine to pair with each courses. Very impressed by the service, very attentive and friendly. The food was tasty and well presented. I’ll definitely come back.

title: Incredible experience!
comment: Incredible experience! I came a few weeks ago with my husband for our anniversary. Very impressed by the quality of the dishes, the prawn starter and the duck for main was stunning, very tasty and unusual..! The lemon tart was also delicious. Many thanks to Guillaume for the outstanding service, he was very knowledgeable and brought us an anniversary plate. One of the best dinner we’ve never had. Definitely worth it. I will come back soon, thank you again.

title: Incredible food with a view - the full package!
comment: I tried out the brunch on a sunny Sunday and was bowled over by the level of food and service. Seriously underrated restaurant and tucked out of the way in Canary Wharf, but totally worth a visit. Chef Guillaume is doing something really special up on the 37th floor at Bōkan - all three courses were a delight, especially the Josper grilled pork with padron pepper & potato. Can't wait to go back!

title: Loved It!
comment: I always come here with my colleagues and a part from the view which is magnificent, we always experience a great service. A personal note to Jerome who is always very friendly and helpful :)

title: Excellent meal, great wine
comment: We treated ourselves to a big Saturday night dinner at Bokan and it didn’t disappoint. We had the tasting menu which was a foodies delight with lots if high notes including a wild boar and fig main which stole the show. A word about the wine though. Nelson the sommelier is an absolute star. I honestly can’t recall a better matched wine list for a tasting menu. And by Saturday night London standards it was fairly priced. What else? There’s great live music, a lively bar and terrace for drinks beforehand and of course the amazing view. Go on, treat yourself!

title: An amazing birthday celebration
comment: I had an amazing birthday celebration at this restaurant, in the evening of May 2, 2019. All of the staff members, including the chef master of that evening, were so professional and so nice people. I felt really good when I spent there my 52 birthday with them. They made me feel so special and I am so grateful to everyone. Thank you from the bottom of my heart. Please receive all of my best wishes. Mama :)

title: Fabulous time at Bokan
comment: We had a wonderful time at Bokan. Not only were the views over London spectacular but the staff were incredibly helpful and friendly. We were made to feel welcome and valued, and nothing was too much trouble. We’ll definitely be back.

title: Bokan
comment: That is not a cheap place but the view, the cocktails and the food were simply amazing. The staff extremely friendly and they warmly welcomed my girlfriend and I. We've got a table window so we have been able to enjoy the sunset. Really not much to say except that it was indeed expensive but definitely worth it. We really enjoyed our moment over there

title: Nice view, nice Cockteils
comment: Had really nice time last time visited this place, amazing view, nice selections of cocktail and food

title: AMAZING DINNER
comment: We booked here for a special occasion and since the moment we walked in, everything has been perfect: staff is professional, polite and friendly. Delicious cocktails and amazing food. Superlative views. We will definitely come back.

title: Mr Vegetarian
comment: Had a vegetarian great meal with amazing views! Great service provided by Coco, Ornella of course Guillaume !

title: Nice food
comment: Had breakfast here when I stayed at Novotel. there were nice varieties and more importantly the views outside was wonderful. Service was also good.

title: Amazing view !!
comment: Amazing time with amazing view.... food was very tasty ir with good presentation. Enjoyed everything.... definitely worth to come back...

title: A Treat
comment: Met some friends for dinner and we all tried the tasting menu. It was excellent and complemented the amazing views across London. Could not fault the service and would recommend to anyone wanting something a bit special.

title: Bokan restaurant
comment: Unforgettable experience! Amazing food and excellence service! Breathtaking view!! Best place for birthday dinner :)

title: Nice view good service
comment: If you are staying in Canary wharf, this is a good option as you can have a very good view if the city and it is walking distance From the office buildings there. They also have a bar, so you could go just for a drink. The staff is very friendly a fast. The food is good, but not the highlight.

title: Amazing Views
comment: I love it here the views are spectacular. You can see some of the best bits of London from here. There is a really nice roof top seating area. The bar is lovely it’s a great design. The staff are friendly & helpful. They have a good selection of drinks.

title: Brilliant food and staff
comment: Tasting menu is brilliant and innovative. Beautiful views. Can’t wait for next visit. The staff were attentive and knowledgable

title: View and the service and fantastic bar
comment: This is the place to go if you want to get the best view over Canary Wharf. For dinner reservations is definitely needed for weekend. Food is very nice but bar is just superb. If possible choose a sunny day and enjoy the sunset. Fantastic service.

title: 3rd visit in 5 months
comment: The breathtaking panoramic view over the city may well be the most flagged attraction, but the attentiveness of the staff, the quality of the food, attention to detail and the way all of it is presented enhance the experience and make the atmosphere just as grand inside as the views outside. Well worth a visit and then some more in regular succession.

title: An amazing experience
comment: My husband and I had the most amazing meal at BŌKAN last night. We opted for the Chefs tasting menu which I would HIGHLY recommend. Each course was exquisite and a true work of art. The 24 hour cooker beef with torched bone marrow butter was beyond perfection. The views were stunning; decor beautiful and staff highly professional and attentive. All round it was a very very memorable evening!

title: Hats off to the chef!
comment: The food was amazing, we tried the taster menu and were delighted. Both me and my husband. The service is also flawless, view wonderful. Worth every penny and more!

title: Fantastic!
comment: Definitely well worth the visit. All the staff were extremely welcoming and friendly. The meal was excellent and the views were just breathtaking.

title: Beautiful food and stunning views
comment: Food was delicious and very good quality. Probably the best meal I have ever had! The views were amazing, overlooking central London. Great atmosphere with live singing. Overall, a wonderful experience!

title: Fantastic views
comment: Came here for a couple of drinks whilst visiting friends in London.  Phoned to book a table for 10pm. Arrived to a table reserved in the window with fantastic views over London.  The staff were brilliant. Views incredible. Vast choice of drinks.  Will return.

title: What a view!
comment: This is a great restaurant with a fantastic view over the city. Stunning. The food and service were exceptional. Highly recommended.

title: A hidden gem
comment: It was the second time I’ve been here, we booked a table 2 weeks in advance As Saturdays can get busy. We arrived with no problems - shown to our seats and given a drinks menu, we took our drinks up on the rooftop where we got a table with an amazing view and enjoyed a lovely afternoon in the sun sipping cocktails.

title: Breakfast meeting
comment: Good service. Quality and diversified buffet breakfast. Orders come quickly. The real treat are the stunning views of London. Quite breathtaking.

title: Vaida
comment: Great service, amazing vibe, thanks to Antoneiia! And Angelita! - for making it a NIGHT  Hope Tomas had the blasting birthday night ♥️

title: Bottomless Brunch
comment: I came here with a group of friends for my birthday for the bottomless brunch. I could't spent better time! The place is beautiful, the view on every floor is just stunning, fancy but still casual, the service professional, the food just amazing. We had 3 course meal at £35 pp plus 15£ pp for the bottomless prosecco. Afterwords we went upstairs to the Bar, they do jazz live music on Sundays, so basically spent the whole day without never get bored. There is also a terrace one floor up for smoking or just enjoy the view :) Everything was just perfect! Thank you very much, I've planned already to coming back soon.

title: Bottomless brunch
comment: Visited Bokan last weekend and I was very impressed. Courteous staff, professional and excellent ambiance. Amazing views of London and beautiful decor within the restaurant. Me and my friend opted for Sunday brunch with bottomless Prosecco. We arrived at 1pm and didn’t leave until 4pm! Time flew by with such excellent service. Will definitely visit the restaurant again!

title: Really poor service
comment: Appalling service here tonight. A medium steak came well done, sides came almost at the end of the meal, no apology, and the extremely rude manager decided to have a go at the kitchen staff in front of us. A real pity as all my other experiences here have been amazing.

title: Great ambience, good food, terrible waiters, super long waiting time
comment: We celebrated a 50th birthday with 6 people at Bokan. While the food was generally very good and well presented on the plate, the service was absolutely terrible. The staff was not trained and inattentive. When we asked for the cocktail list, it took forever to arrive, and the waiter could not explain the cocktails and had to get another member of the bar staff. The same happened with the wine menu. Likewise, the waiters were unable to explain certain items on the dinner menu, i.e. what they were or how they were prepared. Everything took an absolutely extraordinary amount of time to arrive. We had endless wait times between courses and long periods with empty drinks. It was very hard to track down the waiters for anything, and we had to physically get up twice to grab one to place an order. It was exhausting and distracting, bringing the mood down.  We were also not served at the same time, i.e. some of us were sitting in front of their rapidly cooling main course while others hadn't received theirs yet. The mashed potatoes that were meant to come with my steak arrived only after I was finished. The same happened to some of our party as well, where side dishes were forgotten or arrived too late.  The food was good, but not outstanding. The "petit fours" that came after dessert, were not what we expected: they included cheap tasting jellied sugar candy and by no means "petit fours," as in “delicate pastry”. I would not recommend the “birthday cake” that we had pre-ordered. It was not a cake in any sense of the word, but a moussey fluffy mass on a hard crust. It was impossible to cut and portion and unpleasant to eat. We left it there despite having paid around £50 in advance.  I’ve heard the same review from friends who, like us, also live in Canary Wharf around the corner from the restaurant. We could be regulars, but I’m worried to go back and have the same experience. This area is in dire need of some outstanding restaurants, and it would be good if Bokan cleaned up their act and invested in better service staff. The ambience and décor are great, very New York. We just need some New York style waiters. There, you’d get served a 3-course meal and are in and out in 1 hour...

title: Great view and great food
comment: Restaurant located on the top floors of Novotel Canary Wharf. The decoration is modern and the views of London are amazing. The service was very nice and the food excellent.

title: Perfect birthday dinner
comment: My boyfriend took me here for my 21st dinner and we both had the vegan tasting menu. The food was incredible and we were sat at a window table which gave us a stunning view of the city.  The staff were all friendly.  The cocktails at the bar were great but the ones at dinner were the same price and a lot smaller so felt a bit ripped off there.

title: Fancy Bar wirh great view London Downtown
comment: In the 38th and 39th floor of the Novotel hotel we had a really good evening with our colleagues. You can book a separate area for ca. 20 people. On the 38th floor there is the open roof top bar with a fantastic view of the coty of London. On the 38th floor you have the main bar area. We had wine and fingerfood. Both were really good. The team was nice. Ibhad the feeling in the peak time of the evening they had to cover quite a lot of guests, but were never stressed and alway friendly. Unfortunately they did not have one type of beer onntap, but I can recommend the IPA. Summary: fancy bar with a full panoramic view. Reservation needed.

title: Brunch with daughter,son in law and granddon
comment: Had brunch today and it was fabulous. Staff were the best,especially our Italian waitress,as was the table we had, corner by the windows with views all round.Food was superb. Every dish we had was so good and my 16 month old grandson loved every mouthful from the children’s menu. Looking forward to returning, especially as we live so near.  Honor Weddell

title: The best rooftop bar in Canary Wharf
comment: Great atmosphere and stunning view! Best place for drinks and quick food in Canary Wharf. Really pleased by the way a member of staff - Veni took care of us last night when I had my birthday celebration. She was constantly checking on us and making sure that we had everything that we need. I'll definitely continue visiting this place.

title: Brilliant Brunch with fizz
comment: First time here for us all for Sunday Brunch with the optional bottomless Prosecco. Absolutely amazing experience and service. Beautiful decor and views of London. Would have enjoyed the roof top terrace had it not been for the very high winds. Our waitress, Deborah? Was outstanding and made us feel special. She was a delight. The food was absolutely wonderful and we totally worth the price, as was the bottomless Prosecco.  Highly recommend

title: Amazing customer ssrvservice ice
comment: We had a lift issue tonight but just want to say we received fantastic customer service. The manager greeted us out the lift and offered us a complimentory bottle of champagne and a great table. All the staff were lovely, we were really treated so well. Will be back soon, thank you bokan really appricaiate it! Liz

title: Beautiful views and excellent service!
comment: My partner and I went to Bokan for our anniversary. Firstly, the views are breath-taking, and I'd love to come back during the summer months to see the views in daylight. The service and food were both incredible! The lamb saddle was particularly good. We also loved how they remembered we were here for our anniversary and brought us over a small complimentary brownie. It was a lovely, unexpected gesture which rounded off the evening well!

title: B day bruch
comment: Sublime - food was perfect and bottomless Prosecco- can’t go wrong - weather was horrible but views were still fab - would love to go again - and will do in the summer

title: Mixed bag
comment: Great music, great cocktails and great venue....shame it was let down by the food. We went for the tasting menu, which really didn't hit the spot. Very well presented but lacked depth in flavour and some odd combinations which just didn't work for me. The beautifully smoked salmon was the stand out dish though. Subtle and uniquely beautiful.  I have to add that all the waiting staff were so attentive, friendly and unpretentious which was really nice. Will definitely come back but not for the tasting menu.

title: Brilliant Bokan
comment: 3rd visit. and pre O2 . Fab early vibe, snappy service. I love this place and taking people who haven't seen the views

title: Great night out
comment: After great cocktails at the bar, we were shown to a corner table in the restaurant with fantastic views in 2 directions. Attentive service and delicious food. They even found us a table in the window in the busy bar. Enjoyed the singer.

title: Not so Happy New Year!
comment: If I could give this place less than 1 star, I would. They completely ruined my New Year's celebration by miss-advertising their venue.  We emailed them on Friday 28th December to simply enquire if they had more tickets available (No expectations as we know how busy this night is, and it was lastminute.com). Failing to respond within 24 hours (which is quite a reasonable expectation for such business) we decided to call instead. Upon speaking to one of their unqualified staff, they advised us that walk-ins will be available all night upon payment of £50 per person at the door. This does not secure any tables which was fine for us as we only wanted to enjoy a drink and watch the fireworks from up high. We were pretty happy with this result!  To our surprise, today we receive a response to our email (4 days later - excellent customer service I must say) informing us that they are fully booked for the night, but hope to see us another time. How nice of them!  As we live in the area we took it upon ourselves to go there personally today and hoped that this will be somehow resolved as they have provided such bad service. Yet again, we were even more disappointed to see that 1st, the manager who responded to our email was so busy she could not take 5 minutes of her time to talk to us about this. 2nd, 'in their defence' (their words, not mine) the manager works office hours and was not there when we called on the weekend, so I guess misinforming clients should be totally acceptable, especially when it comes to one of the busiest nights of the year when all everyone wants is to celebrate somewhere special.  I was shocked to see such bad level of management and customer service from such a nice establishment. I have been to Bokan many times before this, and have personally recommended it to many of my friends as probably the best rooftop bar in London, but I am sorry to say that I will not longer be doing that. To see a manager who would leave their staff to deal with a problem without facing it professionally, and allow others to take blame for their own poor service. Astonishing. Happy New Year Bokan!

title: Great cocktails - terrible service
comment: This bar has an amazing view, great cocktails and good bar snacks but the service was awful! We ordered snacks and a bottle of champagne to celebrate a special occasion. After about 40 minutes we asked about our order and several people can around making excuses about a problem with their “system”. We asked for the manager - he never came and finally our order arrived with the waitress telling us they could comp our cheese plate ..... still no one ever came back to check on us or ask if we had everything! Just terrible service and poor management.

title: Great lunch at Bokan
comment: Totally blown away by lunch at Bokan today.  View was just stunning - we had both daytime & night time - daytime is definitely the best  Food was great & free flow Prosecco kept flowing.  Bread & butter really good - lunch was pretty awesome too.  Highly recommended for great food & great views.

title: Diner at Bokan
comment: It was a marvellous moment, first of all the welcome by Vini was a plaisure, Aurelie the cooker is excellent and Jerome who take care of us was very professional with so british sense of humor. Everything was delicious and we had such a great time.

title: New Year's Eve Dinner
comment: Since the first moment you take the lift to go up until 37th floor with an exclusive lift separated from hotel lobby, until you sit in your table with full views of Central London, there are a lot of pleased and comfortable moments. Rita & Veni, at the reception, are two lovely ladies members of the Team who make your welcome at the restaurant one of the most kind moments. What else? Dinner in New Year's Eve was awesome ( some pictures attached ), where chefs make an amazing mix of flavors, textures & elegant presentations on plates as you only see in best world restaurants. This has been the second time we have booked in Bõkan but will not be the last. Totally recommended.

title: Great views
comment: What a surprise! Went to floor 38 and 39 of the Novotel in Canary Wharf and enjoyed cocktails with amazing views of London. Will definitely return

title: Terrible staff
comment: We popped in for a drink - great view but despite sitting at the bar, it took for ever to get served. When we asked how we could get a drink, a surly and grumpy member of staff (Darina or Davina I think) begrudgingly served us. When we got the bill, there was a ‘discretionary’ service charge added! Oh yes, and to top it off, when leaving, we were virtually bathed out of the way by. Waitress - no ‘excuse me’ or apology - genuinely shocking and made us ashamed to be British!

title: Very good food and ambience
comment: I would highly recommend Bokan for an outstanding food and London views experience ! Really good service and reasonable prices !

title: Beautiful views, beautiful food
comment: We were staying in the hotel and requested a table in the restaurant with a view and although couldnt be guaranteed, we were not disappointed when we arrived, just wow! Food was amazing and the restaurant had a real buzz about it and although a bit chilly in November the rooftop bar is a nice touch.

title: Night out with friends
comment: Wonderful drinks/cocktails beautiful food and even better service from our waitress Antonella such a positive soul we will be back soon

title: The first time I finished everything on my plates!
comment: The food has always been wonderful. Now, the service, The attitude and the smiling faces of the staff match the wonderful food.

title: Birthday Celebration
comment: What an amazing restaurant! Bokan has a very warm and welcoming atmosphere and the entire staff is very courteous. Not to mention that the views are superb! Since the restaurant is in Canary Wharf, you have an astonishing outlook of the entire London area. They even have an outdoor terrace, that is well-heated, where you can enjoy a few drinks. Being there for my birthday, I felt very spoiled. The food was prepared very tasty and there was attention paid to the aesthetic of the dishes.

title: Amazing floor to ceiling views
comment: Great little bar in Canary Wharf hotel. Views are spectacular. Trendy little bar. Good wine. Didn’t eat. Reserve a table if you can.

title: Amazing view, cocktails meh
comment: So the title might be misleading slightly but it is my overall feeling. Let me explain that personally I judge a bar by its Long Island Ice Tea, especially one that charges a service charge even with drinks ordered at the bar... First round OK, but my wife who asked for a double gin and tonic ended up having to get another bottle of tonic. Sure you will say that you get a lot of gin, but it ruined the experience initially. Long Island was OK,but not stellar.  Then onto the the 2nd. Well, if I had wanted to order Tequila I would have,but I didn't. To say the bar person took it badly is a bit of an understatement. Sure he may have thought he was OK about it, but sadly some of us can read body language, the rolls of the eyes and lip reading the commentary to his friends sat at the bar. There wasn't really much of an improvement on the second try but I was too tired to argue. Overall poor rating based on the experience but the view is great

title: Awful experience!
comment: We spent a girls weekend in London and booked this restaurant as it looked amazing from the photos but we were very disappointed! It was like a marathon, the minute we sat down everything was rushed and we didn't have time to relax or enjoy our food or drinks. We ordered cocktails to start our evening but those didn't arrive until after our starter so we had no drinks with our started. We then finally received the cocktails with our main but since we prefered to drink wine with the main we had to chuck down our cocktails and quickly order the wine before we finished our main. We felt all so sick after our food because everything was rushed and we had no time to diggest or even enjoy our food. The staff was rude to us as well. We asked two people if they could take a photo of us but they both turned us down very rudely because they didn't have time. At least they could have said sorry in a friendly tone that they don't have time but they amlost shouted at us for asking the.  When we confronted our waiter Florian and told him that everything is too fast and that we're having a bad time he just ignored us and told us yes the service needs to be fast and then he left as he didn't like the confrontation. If your table tells you that they're having a bas time then as a good waitor you should at least try and change things, but he didn't. So we just decided not to take desert and just leave as it was just so horrible. Such a shame because it's such a beautiful place but I guess they didn't want us there ... Carole

title: I only did drinks - fantastic
comment: What a great find. This place has both a rooftop bar and restaurant with stunning views across London. I was so impressed with my first visit that I went back the following weekend. I have also now booked the restaurant for December. The drink prices are average for London but the views are exceptional. There are a number of places to sit and take in the views, however the outside terrace is quite small and can get a bit smoky. Having said that it does depend on who is sitting outside when you visit. Lovely selection of drinks and bar snacks if you want to while away a couple of hours.

title: Beautiful Bottomless Brunch
comment: We have made Bokan a must every time I visit London to see my favourite gal. We have had amazing service on both occasions with Constantin, and would recommend this wonderful experience to anyone!

title: Average sky bar
comment: This sky bar offers lovely views and a nice sheltered seating area outside. However the bar has a a very small selection of cocktails. I visited on a Saturday night, and ordered one cocktail to be told they can’t make it. So I chose another cocktail and got told again, he can’t make it. I asked if he was serving cocktails, he said yes but not those two, they don’t have the alcohol for it! How can a sky bar not have the alcohol to make cocktails, I do not understand. This is a busy Saturday night after all. I was not offered an alternative cocktail either. I would say poor bar service could be improved a lot! I wouldn’t recommend this sky bar if you wish to have cocktails as they only have a small menu and they probably won’t be able to make them either!

title: Bottomless lunch left us wanting
comment: Poor service, slow, unfriendly and made us feel as if we were an inconvenience. Food was ok, not special but perfectly fine for a set menu. Glasses were never topped up willingly. Only got 4 glasses each in the whole 2 hours. Not worth the £50

title: Mother in Law's 70th Birthday celebration- excellent experience
comment: We recently celebrated my mother in law's 70th birthday at the Bokan restaurant. We were a diverse group, including toddler, young children and two generations of adults, many of us with different dietary preferences. The restaurant staff were extremely friendly, accommodating and hospitable. They attended to all our needs and queries and ensured all of us had the mostly amazing experience. The food was freshly prepared and very delicious. The price is on the higher range but worth the quality of food, beautiful view from the table as well as from the roof top. Starting from the reservation process to the dining and billing, it was a very smooth experience and I would highly recommend this restaurant for celebrations of all kinds; including those involving small and fidgety children:-)

title: Delicious food
comment: We dined at Bokan and we had an amazing time. Food is great, there was live music which added a nice ambiance. I had the best dessert ever : meringue, banana, avocado, coconut and tequila sorbet. Wow !! The place is cool, the view over London is beautiful and the waiters are lovely. I would definitely go back to this restaurant.

title: Amazing venue and great view.. service inconsistent
comment: It is an amazing venue, beautifully presented with gorgeous views of the city. The food was of an excellent standard. What let it down was the awkward and inconsistent service. The host was really lovely and helpful upon our arrival and even gave us a window seat which was great. However the service at the table felt rushed... we had literally just sat down and were approached for our drink orders immediately . We hadn't had a chance to look at the menus yet. The waiter was pleasant enough, but came across as robotic and scripted in his interactions and throughout the meal kept asking how it was going. once is enough. Then they seemed in a rush to take our dishes away after each course when we hadn't quite finished. What was annoying at the end of the meal was the miscommunication from the waiter ,who told us they'd stopped serving drinks in the restaurant, however we could go down to the bar. SO we headed down waited to order at the bar and after waiting for about 5-10 minutes were asked if we were hotel guests (which we weren't) , we were then told that only hotel guests could be served at this time of the evening! Couldn't they have told us this at the start whilst we were waiting? I think after spending £250 for 2 people in the restaurant they could make an exception? The restaurant could be outstanding if they sorted out their service.

title: Astonishing view
comment: Fantastic atmosphere... for drinks and we ordered starters to share...tasty.. If the weather is good... the best photos of London

title: The best food I ate in London
comment: Being a frequent Visitor of London, I was curious to discover this restaurant on the 37th Floor of Novotel Canary Warf. And I was so impressed. The staff are very knowledgeable. The card offers vegitarian, fish and meat... and the quality of the food was awesome. Beautiful starter, Great entree and the cheese for dessert is to die for. And then a big shout out to our waiter Guillaume. Adviced us a Great wine that both matched the bouillabaisse and the red meat. And he Made lots of little Jokes to make us feel special. And WHERE DID THEY FIND CHEF AURELIE?! Working it in her open kitchen was a joy to watch. Make a reservation! Enjoy the view of London and be heart warmed.

title: Thank you mr B
comment: Excellent place, with a great dirty Martiny. Thank you!  Also I don’t drink gin, but my friend does and he enjoyed his treat too!

title: What a gem!
comment: Last night in London and this was the place we chose to do dinner and drinks. Antonella, our waitress was absolutely amazing :) wonderful customer service, great food and spectacular views! An amazing way to end a great holiday.

title: Tasting menu not so great
comment: My wife and I went for our anniversary as a recommendation from a work. Colleague. I have to say the place was perfect for the occasion very friendly staff and good live music with a roof garden at the 39th floor, everything till there was great. Now comes the menu a la carte or the £70 pp tasting menu on paper looked appealing and decided to go for the tasting menu option. Big mistake there was no a single item that we can say it was enjoyable where dishes we so over power by the 50% French liquor that killed everything to very blunt slow cooked beef.. Very desappointing

We booked into Bokan as we were staying in the hotel, and weren't due to arrive until late and didn't want the hassle of going back out again to eat. The atmosphere and view is great and the waiting staff are attentive, but the food was very much a 50/50 thing. The other half said his lamb was one of the best meals he'd ever had, my cod however had to be sent back as it was stone cold and raw in the middle (I suspect from the texture it was previously frozen). When the replacement (very quickly) came it was so very salty it was almost inedible, coupled with the over salted fries it made for a unpleasant meal which was marginally rescued by a fabulous desert .

title: Cool venue but pricey
comment: Very nice vista and atmosphere and relatively quiet on a weeknight so good place for a sophisticated date. Be warned though at roughly £12 for a small cocktail it could get pricey depending on your tolerance for such things.

title: Good views and good dishes
comment: It’s a little bit of a walk and not in the most auspicious of settings but it was worth it. Wines were decent value: Viognier and red from the Douro were keenly priced and tasty. Guests were surprised when I told them the price.  I went for the crab salad then the lobster and scallop ravioli - both were excellent. The crab salad was exceptionally fresh with a lovely, spikey and zesty dressing.  The bread was served really nicely in a tear and share fashion.  Will definitely return.

title: Birthday
comment: I had a great time, Antoinella gave us amazing customer service experience and even brought us chocoloatea at the end for my birthday. The managers were also very helpful and understanding. I’m definitely recommending this place for any occassion!

title: Exceptional!
comment: This place is a fantastic restaurant! This is the second time that I am going for dinner to Bokan and I absolutely loved it! Friendly and professional staff! The cuisine is exquisite! The Chef is brilliant! From starters to deserts you will be surprised and your palate will want some more... I would have never imagined to try parmesan ice cream one day but believe me you have to try it, with an apple tart and lemon cream it's wonderful! And that's one of the many delights the Chef wants to make you discover!  And don't forget the view ,it's stunning!  I just can't wait to go back!  Thanks again!

title: Amazing
comment: From the beginning until the end this venue is perfect! The staff is so friendly and professional, and what a meal!  The tasting menu pairing with wine was absolutely Fabulous!, the chef is exceptional and you can discover many different way to enjoy the flavour of the world. The view of London is wonderful as well! I will definitely coming back  Cyril

title: Very Good Breakfasts
comment: Great breakfasts and attentive staff, but they could smile a bit more. Otherwise, it all seems a bit perfunctory.

title: New Cocktail
comment: Ladies first ! Truly recommend this cocktail from very talented Adam ! one of the best cocktail I’ve ever drink in Bokan bar. Magnificent taste!  Thank you Adam so much and hopefully see you soon.

title: Outstanding
comment: We wanted somewhere in London to Celebrate 3 60th birthdays this year with work colleagues. I picked Bokan from the previous reviews and I'm delighted I did, what a find! From the pre lunch drinks ably mixed by Matteo to the amazing lunch with (very) free flowing Prosecco and the stunning views, even from the toilet! Our waiter Florian and the team looked after us very, very well. I could not find a fault with any of the excellent courses served and all six of us who dined agreed on an outstanding experience. Thank you Bokan, we will be back!

title: beautiful restaurant!
comment: Great good, friendly staff and fantastic views over central London. Met some work colleagues here for dinner and had a very pleasant dinner, good choice of food, including catering for a vegetarian in our group. Total price was reasonable based on what we ate and wine consumed. Would recommend as social or work dinner venue.

title: Bokan
comment: First time at Bokan for a date night. View and atmosphere really good. Reserved a table at the bar. Staff very helpful and friendly. Service was excellent. Very nice and helpful gentleman called Breno served us and the day...thanks mate; it was a pleasure! Definitely would go back and highly recommended.

title: Good view, bad service
comment: We had really bad service, change of courses took a really long time. Some of waiters speak English inseparably, so we struggled to understand them sometimes. One Polish waiter was like from distant village asking us “Are you okay now?”, “you didn’t like the food?” when I didn’t finish it. This kind of level would be acceptable in road cafe in Belarus but not on rooftop restaurant in London.

title: Ok food, terrible service
comment: My husband and I were staying at the Novotel for a couple of days and on our first night, decided to have dinner at Bokan. We were shown to a table and were sat for probably about 15 minutes before our order (drink and food) was taken. Around 40 minutes later, we still hadn’t received our drinks, never mind the food. This was despite a couple who came in after us getting both food and drinks long before us. The waiters kept walking past and looking at the table and could clearly see we didn’t have any drinks yet, but did nothing about it. It wasn’t until I got the attention of a female member of staff, who looked to be in charge possibly and mentioned it to her that something started to be done. It was however, an hour, before we even got our drinks and then eventually our food came out. We were charged a £7.25 service charge, which seemed excessive seeing as it took so long to get anything to eat or drink. When the food arrived, it was ok but nothing special and certainly not worth the wait. I wouldn’t recommend this place, we certainly weren’t made to feel very welcome and nothing was offered as an apology for the poor service.

title: anniversary surprise
comment: The staff were friendly and very attentive, the view amazing and the food in the chefs selection tremendous - Oh how I wish we hadn't had the prosecco which did nothing to compliment the great food. When we go again I will order a decent bottle of wine

title: What a fantastic view
comment: Actually only had drinks in the bar - but what a fantastic roof top - 39 floors up in the open. Wonderful views of the Thames and landmarks.

title: Excellent food and service
comment: The food was amazing and the service made it top notch! We were looked after by Florian and his energy made the dinner experience much better. :)

title: Relaxed dining with fabulous views.
comment: Fabulous warm welcome. Selected taster menu the food was just perfect highly recommended each course was described in detail by Florian his care and attention to detail was 1st class. Thank you for giving us time to just chatter on and on.

title: One of the Most Chic Bars in London with the Best Hostess
comment: I'm very picky when it comes to bars and certainly from the very first time I visited Bokan it stole me!! The views of Canary Wharf and the Thames are breathtaking, the service and atmosphere are top, but the person who has made my experience there special every time I visit and now I've become a regular is the hostess Veni, who doesn't make you feel like she is just doing her job, she makes you feel welcomed, always smiling with a great positive energy.

title: Amazing!
comment: If you want to have a nice drink in chilled and beautiful place and of course don’t forget the views of London, Bokan will surely exceed your expectations! Thank you Antonella Eveline Mr. B Peter for looking after us sooo well! We are definitely coming back :)

title: Simply superb
comment: Great location and view. Fantastic service and amazing meal. Congrats to the Chef and all the staff. A must in future visits and my wife and I highly recommend.

title: Brilliant Bokan
comment: My second vsit. Fab location for pre's and food. Service can be a bit slow but if you speak to staff about your timing needs and seek their help you'll have a great visit.

title: Terrible service
comment: Staff probably mean well but due to poor communication the service is terrible. Waited 40mins for just the food menu. Then waited 20mins for someone to take order... Waitress had audacity to say we were in the wrong somehow instead of simply apologising. Not to be too politically incorrect but employing migrant workers that do not use English as their first language is not always a good idea.

title: Great rooftop find
comment: Fab find at the top of our hotel. The bar staff are so friendly, and designed me a birthday cocktail. We were lucky to have incredible hot weather, and enjoyed the sun going down.

title: Perfect Lunch
comment: This restaurant was a surprise for my 60th birthday. It exceeded all my expectations. The bottomless prosecco flowed. The three courses were tasty, well presented and the chocolate pudding with mint sorbet delicious. Then I got a beautiful cake and a birthday song. It was so sweet. The staff were attention very, polite and professional. The views to die for. Thank you for a very special day. Lots of young people. But still here I for a middle aged lady!

title: Excellent just the best
comment: The food was awesome, the view breathtaking and the service great. Also the prices were reasonable. Not to miss!

title: Dinner
comment: My friend and I enjoyed a very pleasant evening at Bokan. We were very impressed of the view, menu and the staff. I would definitely recommend Bokan to anyone that visits London.

title: Nice Place for Drinks with a View
comment: We brought our guests for drinks on 2 occasions. The first time we were there, 2 people ordered a double gin tonic which we thought was watered down. As I could not drink alcoholic beverages during the second time we were there, I ordered orange juice which was also watered down. The view of the city is nice, but alcoholic drinks seem pricey; I guess you pay for the view. There is already a 12.5% service charge, so tips should not be expected but their system indicates otherwise and servers still ask if you want to give a tip or not.

title: Great service
comment: Florian was an absolute delight! Definitely recommend. Food was delicious and wine recommendations were very on point. Thank you for a good night

title: Second visit to this fantastic bar and restaurant, with very high quality food and service. Feels really special.
comment: 2nd visit and very glad I've returned. This time ordered A La Carte rather than tasting menu and was again wowed by the food, its presentation and the generosity of the portion sizes. Excellent service throughout the meal. Those wonderful views. Absolutely love this place! My descriptions won't do it justice: please check out my photos.

title: Wonderful evening
comment: I enjoyed a very pleasant evening at Bokan. I was very impressed of the view, menu and the staff, especially Veni, she was an amazing hostess. I would definitely recommend Bokan to anyone in London.

title: Excellent - need I say any more?
comment: I v rarely, if ever use the word 'excellent', but we had a wonderful dining experience at Bokan. Brother's 40th birthday dinner - accomodated for 5 adults and 2 kids with a table that had a marvellous sunset view of the London skyline. It is important to mention the children diner policy - Bokan are v welcoming and accommodating with a catered kids' menu) because you would not believe how snobby some restaurants are, not allowing kids below 7 years of age to dine. Staff were attentive, knowledgeable and professional.  I will admit to having a small degree of apprehension with the menu after having been burned on a couple of previous dining experiences elsewhere. However. I was v pleased with the quality of the food and preparation. We went a la carte and the food was delicious. As was the dessert. Yes - you pay a little bit more of a premium, but the quality of the food, the service, and the location/view is all worth it!

title: Nice
comment: The wiev, the food, the service all exellente! Good value for money and highly attentive staff. Would go again.

title: Absolute shocker of a restaurant
comment: We went for a bottomless prosecco lunch with friends, with the only plus coming from the flowing prosecco.  The Niçoise salad came with no tuna. When this was pointed out, a saucer of extremely poorly prepared tuna was slapped down on the table. I ordered a smoked pork starter that was a disgrace. I can’t explain what it was. Green tasteless slop with a few saffron sized strands of pork. Three of the party ordered steak but weren’t asked how we’d like it cooked. When it arrived it was dry and again, tasteless.  The cheese board consisted of cheap cheese straight out of the fridge. After requesting the service charge be removed from the bill the waitress said she didn’t care why we were dissatisfied. One of the worst meals and service I’ve had at a supposedly ‘fine’ restaurant.

title: Stunning London view
comment: Went for the view and found a gem off the beaten track. Elegant interior design with rustic finishes that gives the space a cosy feel. Windows throughout, comfy sofas. Prices ok for a rooftop/high bar.

title: Superb food and service
comment: Fantastic view over London. Service was excellent from start to finish and the food was exceptional. So much so I sought out the head chef to thank him. The John Dory was the best I've ever had. Faultless throughout.

title: Mesmerising views..!
comment: Beautiful place Nice ambient, with singer and live band.  They have a huge liquor display but unfortunately a bit disappointed about the cocktails timing arrived to table and quality check drinks. 3 negroni 3 different glass.and garnishes Ambience 8/10 Food 5/10  Service 6/10 Drinks 4/10

title: Great Views to enjoy a cigar and a drink
comment: Breathtaking views of London to enjoy a cigar and a drink at night.
